page.title: 07TECHNOLOGY
page.content: OUR SCHOOL HAS SEVEN COMPUTERS, A TANDY TRS80, A COMMODORE PET, A SPECTRUM, AND 4 BBC COMPUTERS. ALMOST EVERYONE I KNOW HAS A HOME COMPUTER. I THINK THE BEST HOME COMPUTER IS THE SPECTRUM, WITH 48K OF USER MEMORY. WHEN I GET TO SCHOOL IN THE MORNING, I SET UP THE BBC COMPUTERS. AT THE MOMENT OUR CLASS ARE CONCENTRATING ON THE DOMESDAY PROJECT, BUT WE ALSO HAVE BEEN USING A ROBOTIX MODEL KIT WHICH INCLUDES 4 MOTORS WHICH WE CONTROL FROM THE COMPUTER. 6 CHILDREN FROM OUR CLASS HAVE RECENTLY GONE TO LONDON TO BE FILMED FOR THAMES TELEVISION'S "DATABASE" (SEPT 1985)
